message:
This previous response from [Dave] failed to parse!: 'Chad, there seems to be a misunderstanding. According to the history, I have not yet PUT bread_slice1 on the cutting board. I am currently holding bacon, and bread_slice1 is still on my side. I need to PUT bread_slice1 on the cutting board first before you can PUT the tomato on it. I will PUT bread_slice1 on the cutting board this round, and you should WAIT.

EXECUTE
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
NAME Dave ACTION PUT bread_slice1 cutting_board'
Object bread_slice1 cannot be PUT down, robot Dave is not in contact with it. Re-format to strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!

Chad, there seems to be a misunderstanding. According to the history, I have not yet PUT bread_slice1 on the cutting board. I am currently holding bacon, and bread_slice1 is still on my side. I need to PUT bread_slice1 on the cutting board first before you can PUT the tomato on it. I will PUT bread_slice1 on the cutting board this round, and you should WAIT.

EXECUTE
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
NAME Dave ACTION PUT bread_slice1 cutting_board
